text:
Hey! I've had a good week so far (if you exclude all the homework I've been given for over half term). Ah, I'm glad you cleared up the whole A-Level thing, as you must be slightly insane to study 4 A Levels properly. 

I've applied for BTEC Music Performance and BTEC Music Technology. From what I've been told it's almost 100% coursework (so no stressful exams in exam season after the two years). It's way more vocational compared to the A-Levels. I study GCSE music at the moment so it's going to be quite a change to what I'm used to.

Also I haven't been to any Proms, but I've been to a few orchestrial performances before. And I do practice piano everyday (Yonsei University has a very high standard haha). And I have to do music theory as part of my GCSE course haha.
